title: Update regarding Velocity Motors
story_body:
Velocity Motors Corporation, a leading manufacturer of electric vehicles, announced the appointment of Emily Chen as its new Director of Sustainability, effective immediately. Ms. Chen will oversee the company's environmental, social, and governance initiatives.

In marketing news, Velocity Motors Corporation launched a new advertising campaign for its flagship model, the VELO IX, on January 10, 2023, at 09:00 EST. The campaign will run for six weeks and feature targeted online ads and social media promotions.

Additionally, Velocity Motors Corporation reported that it has achieved a 2% reduction in greenhouse gas emissions from its manufacturing operations in the fourth quarter of 2022, compared to the same period in 2021. This reduction is part of the company's ongoing efforts to minimize its environmental impact.

Velocity Motors Corporation's stock, traded on the NASDAQ exchange under the ticker symbol VELO, closed at 43.21 USD on January 11, 2023, at 16:00 EST.
